*div1 type="summary"* *p*Ebel Milton et al. to Austin, August 13, 1832. Reporting murder of H. Bead by Indians, and asking assistance for a campaign.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Tenosticland */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="08-13-1832">August 13th 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Gentl*/p*
*p*Your fellow *person_mentioned*Sitizens of the *location_mentioned*upper Colony */location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*have to inform you of the death of our valued *person_mentioned*friend */person_mentioned*and fellow *person_mentioned*Sitizen Mr H Read*/person_mentioned*-—who was found on *date_mentioned n="08-10-1832">Friday morning last*/date_mentioned*—he was killed on *date_mentioned n="08-09-1832">thursday Evening*/date_mentioned* on his way from this place to his *person_mentioned*Father */person_mentioned*within *location_mentioned*one mile of the latter place */location_mentioned*This foul deed was commited by the *person_mentioned*Indians*/person_mentioned*—the point of several arrows have been extracted from his body circumstances and facts which have since been discovered Leave but Little doubt of its having been done by the *person_mentioned*Ketchie tribe*/person_mentioned* who have their *location_mentioned*Town*/location_mentioned* about *location_mentioned*fifty miles distant from this place*/location_mentioned*— Your fellow *person_mentioned*Sitizens*/person_mentioned* feel it a duty which they ow to themselves as well as a duty to a departed *person_mentioned*friend */person_mentioned*to avenge this outrage on humanity We feel that we have not a sufficient force to go and attact their *location_mentioned*Town */location_mentioned*and drive them from our *location_mentioned*borders */location_mentioned*and respectfully Solisit the aid of our fellow *person_mentioned*Sitizens of the *location_mentioned*Lower Colony*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* to enable us to carry into effect this Mutch desired object we can start from fifteen to twenty *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*we are well informed the *person_mentioned*Ketchies */person_mentioned*have about seventy five fiting men we request you will Send to our aid sutch number of *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned*as you may think necessary to effect our object We regret to say that the *person_mentioned*military force*/person_mentioned* Stationed here has taken but Little interest in the matter and we fear nothing is to be expected from them Your early attention and complyance will be reed as a Spec-favour*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Ebel Milton.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Radford Berry*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*F. Smith*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Wm. H. Smith*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John Teal*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Thomas __________ */person_mentioned*[illegible] */p*
*p**person_mentioned*Cols Cole*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
